text:
Frank Cullotta (December 14, 1938 – August 20, 2020) was an American mobster for the Chicago Outfit. He was a member of the "Hole in the Wall Gang" in Las Vegas with friend and mobster Tony Spilotro.
After his arrest in 1982, he became a government witness, and entered the witness protection program. Cullotta later became an author and a tour guide. He worked as a movie consultant for mobster/mafia movies such as for "Casino".
On August 20, 2020, Cullotta died at the age of 81 in a Las Vegas hospital from complications related to COVID-19 and other medical issues.
